page.title: 03LANDSCAPE
page.content: This area is mainly used for farming,the land on the valley floor being high quality farming land.Here the river Exe meanders through a flat flood plain between the the sides of the valley.The fields are large,hedgerows having been removed,along with trees,to accomodate modern farming methods.Some attempts are being made to restore trees in the remaining banks and hedgerows. To east and west of the block the land rises,and the undulating surface has smaller fields and more trees.In these areas there are copses and an orchard. Within this block there is a marked contrast between the low and the high ground.
